last_episode_to_air.name: Part Eight
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lindsay does a fashion shoot and app launch and announces her new movie at Sundance.

name: Lindsay
overview: Lindsay Lohan returns to New York City and reunites with friends and family. As Lindsay works to stay on track amid the demands (and pitfalls) of fame, she opens up as never before.

episodes.name: Part One
episodes.overview: After completing her sixth stay in rehab, Lindsay Lohan decides to move to New York to work on her sobriety and rebuild her once promising career. Fearing that this may be her last chance, Lindsay vows to finally get her life back on track.

episodes.name: Part Two
episodes.overview: While trying to manage her sobriety in a chaotic setting, Lindsay fights to move into her new apartment. She has a heated conversation with her dad and struggles with her mom's DUI as the producers start to question her commitment to the series.

episodes.name: Part Three
episodes.overview: Oprah travels to Lindsay's mother's Long Island home after Lindsay refuses to let cameras film and her assistant threatens to quit.

episodes.name: Part Four
episodes.overview: After visiting with Oprah, Lindsay does a skit with Jimmy Fallon in an attempt to rebuild her career, and she finds herself in charge of her own sobriety when her coach returns to Los Angeles.

episodes.name: Part Five
episodes.overview: A large amount of possessions arrive at Lindsay's apartment. Later, her commitment to sobriety is questioned.

episodes.name: Part Six
episodes.overview: Lindsay gives an interview for her mom's book, and later causes controversy due to her unreliable nature with hosting duties at a party and a magazine cover shoot.

episodes.name: Part Seven
episodes.overview: Lindsay causes a scandal in Miami, and later prepares for her first job since rehab, introducing Miley Cyrus at the Jingle Ball.

episodes.name: Part Eight
episodes.overview: Lindsay does a fashion shoot and app launch and announces her new movie at Sundance.
